api_list.api_description: Parser a wiki page and return its HTML content.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Title of the page to parse.

optional_parameters.name: wiki
optional_parameters.description: The wiki endpoint to use. Defaults to English Wikipedia.

api_list.api_description: Perform a single search for a specific show by name.

query: Can you provide the Wikipedia page content for 'Breaking Bad'? Also, I'd like detailed information about the show 'Breaking Bad' from TVmaze.
